name: FAMILY AT HOME 2
description:
FAMILY AT HOME This game tells the story of a young boy named Alonso. He goes to visit his aunt, Victoria, in her new house, together with his mother, Rebeca, and his sister, Samantha. The plan was to spend a weekend, but after a series of changes, he will be locked up with more than 8 women in a house, you will be able to take advantage of this opportunity and spend many moments with them. The game will consist of 5 chapters, in each chapter there will be 2 parts. As you can see, in total the game will have 10 updates.

Changelog: The novel was made from scratch, the characters are the same and so is the story. We added the missing content of the first chapter, there are more than 600 images. 3 new characters were added, Sol, Ana and Thomas. And there are events with each character in this chapter

What is new in this chapter?

  • Added more than 100 images
  • More than 25 animations have been added.
  • Improved the fluidity of the novel
  • New content with Amelia.
  • New content with Rebeca
  • New content with Ana
  • New content with Sol and Thomas
  • New content with Victoria
  • New content with Farah
  • New content with Sarah
  • New content with Emilia
  • New character "Grace" added
IMAGES:

MI PATREON: https://www.patreon.com/SALRGames?fan_landing=true
